page.title: 08EDUCATION IN EYKE PARISH
page.content:
There are no schools within this area, so school age children are transported by bus or taxi to Eyke First School (ages 5 to 9 years), Butley Middle School (ages 9 to 13 years), or Farlingaye High School in Woodbridge (ages 13 to 18 years).
Preschool children ages 3 to 5 can attend a playgroup which is held in the Old School House at Eyke; parents are responsible for transport.
American children can make use of the educational facilities at the discretion of the local authorities, but parents must arrange their own transport.
